⚠️ WARNING: This diagram contains sensitive credentials. These are for POC/Development only. Change all passwords in production!
• Create branches and commit generated files
WHY: Fetch code quality metrics, bugs, vulnerabilities,
code smells, and quality gate status for projects
WHY: Manage artifact repositories, search components,
list Docker images, and manage repository tasks
WHY: Ollama generates pipelines using LLM. ChromaDB
stores feedback vectors for reinforcement learning
WHY: Main DB for modernization-api app data.
Separate DBs for SonarQube and Redmine isolation
WHY: Central Git repository and CI/CD platform.
Hosts all code repos and runs pipeline jobs
WHY: S3-compatible object storage for file uploads,
WHY: Web UI for chatting with Ollama models.
Hosts the Pipeline Generator tool integration
CONNECTION FLOW - Why Each Service Connects
Git repos, CI/CD pipelines, code hosting
